ApexSuggestUsingNamedCred.description:
Description

Detects hardcoded credentials used in requests to an endpoint.

You should refrain from hardcoding credentials:

Instead, you should useNamed Credentialsand a callout endpoint.

For more information, you can checkthis

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
ApexSuggestUsingNamedCred.option: This rule has no specific options.
